What is Aperator?
Send actionable commands from Twitter to other web applications.
Currently, aperator supports commands for Delicious, Facebook, Foursquare and Read it Later.
Aperator Syntax
@aperator delicious www.example.com @aperator ril www.example.com @aperator fb Im here at WEBAPPS @aperator 4sq Fenway Park
